title: You can get a rare discount on the Nintendo Switch right now
text:
You can get a rare discount on the Nintendo Switch right now

Now's the time to save on a brand new Switch, before they sell out. (Photo: Getty Images)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

It's a safe bet that a new Nintendo Switch is going to be on everyone's wishlist this holiday season. I've pretty much wanted one since they were released, but haven't had the courage to splurge on the $300 gaming console just yet. With Black Friday coming up, I expect them to sell out incredibly fast unfortunately, but right now there's a limited-time deal on the new and improved Switch that caught my eye. A discount like this is incredibly rare, so listen up gamers.

Right now on Amazon if you clip the on-page coupon, you can save a cool $24.01 on this Switch, which will bring the price down to $274.99 at checkout. This discount is on the upgraded model, which comes with an increased battery life—approximately 4.5 to 9 hours depending on the game you play. You can choose from either the grey or red and blue joy-cons, as the coupon can be applied to either.

Retailers rarely, if ever, discount the Switch, so this coupon is literally a diamond in the rough. While we presume that Amazon and other stores may drop the price even lower on Black Friday, you'll have to be swift like a bunny if you want to score it on sale, and will have to risk it selling out, which is why this deal might be the safer bet if you'd like to ensure that you'll save on one.

I for one, am seriously debating jumping on this sale and snagging a Switch for myself. That way I finally get to play Mario Kart, Overcooked, and the all-new Animal Crossing (being released next March) with my Switch-owning friends, whom I'm insanely jealous of.
